tutorial_definitions.name: select_deck_1
tutorial_definitions.description: Welcome to your first$Realm of Beasts story!$This is a tutorial box.$If at any point you want$to stop seeing tutorials,$click the checkbox above.

tutorial_definitions.name: select_deck_2
tutorial_definitions.description: Stories are your attempts$to beat the game.$In this screen you can$select the deck for your$first story attempt!

tutorial_definitions.name: select_deck_3
tutorial_definitions.description: Dinosaurs have immense$strength, and high cost.$Gnawers can dig,$surviving the end of turn.$Insects can poison the$enemy, killing them slowly!

tutorial_definitions.name: story_map_1
tutorial_definitions.description: This is a Story Map.$Here you will go through$many battles & events$on your way to reach the$final boss of the map!

tutorial_definitions.name: battle_1
tutorial_definitions.description: This is your first Battle.$This is your opponent's$Health(<health>). Bring it down$to 0 to win this battle!

tutorial_definitions.name: battle_2
tutorial_definitions.description: This is your Health(<health>).$If it reaches 0 at any$point in the story, it is$game over, and time for a$new story!

tutorial_definitions.name: battle_3
tutorial_definitions.description: Both players need to use$their Weight(<weight>) crystals$to play cards each turn.$Each turn the available <weight>$will refresh, and also$increase up to a max!

tutorial_definitions.name: battle_armor
tutorial_definitions.description: Your opponent has$Armor(<armor>). <armor> protects <health>$and recharges every turn.

tutorial_definitions.name: battle_history
tutorial_definitions.description: Your opponent played a$card. If at any point you$want to check what took$place in a battle, you$can visit the History tab!

tutorial_definitions.name: battle_end_turn
tutorial_definitions.description: To end your turn click on$the Turn Indicator button.$Any Normal cards on your$side of the board will$attack the opponent.

tutorial_definitions.name: battle_drew_normal_card
tutorial_definitions.description: You just drew a Normal$card! Normal cards have$Attack(<damage>) and will hit$the opponent at the end$of the turn, before they$get destroyed.

tutorial_definitions.name: battle_drew_spell_card
tutorial_definitions.description: You just drew a Spell$card! Spell cards have$effects that instantly$activate when played!$Highlight a Spell card$to read about its effect.

tutorial_definitions.name: battle_drew_single_use_spell_card
tutorial_definitions.description: You just drew a Single$Use Spell card! Single$Use Spells have a star$symbol and can only be$played once during the$course of a battle!

tutorial_definitions.name: battle_how_to_play_a_card
tutorial_definitions.description: You can play any card$for which you have enough$leftover <weight> for.$Just drag & drop it close$ to the highlighted$indicator on the board.

tutorial_definitions.name: battle_victory
tutorial_definitions.description: You defeated your first$opponent. Great job!$Defeated enemies will$reward you with coins(<coin>),$a small amount of <health>$back and more...

tutorial_definitions.name: battle_card_selection_reward
tutorial_definitions.description: All battles will reward$you with a selection of 3$cards to pick one and add$to your story deck pool.$Click Skip Rewards if you$ don't want any.

tutorial_definitions.name: battle_wheel_reward
tutorial_definitions.description: Elite Battles will also$reward you with a rare$Wheel of Fortune,$containing many$powerful rewards!

tutorial_definitions.name: event
tutorial_definitions.description: Events are mini scenarios$where you can make$different choices that$will affect many aspects$of this story.

tutorial_definitions.name: new_artifact_in_bag
tutorial_definitions.description: You received an Artifact!$Artifacts are rare items$with powerful effects$that can completely turn$the tables in your favor$during this story!

tutorial_definitions.name: new_card_in_deck
tutorial_definitions.description: Your current story deck$pool can be inspected by$clicking on the Deck icon.
